 K: 56.5 g (Potassium carbonate, K2CO3)

 Sc: 140 g (Scandium oxide, Sc2O3)

preparation.raw_text:

 2. In a clean, dry glass container, add 100 g of Cs2CO3. 
 3. Add 56.5 g of K2CO3 to the container.
